byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.longDescription: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. It provides a secure way to utilize these devices while in the rear seat of your BMW. This product is used in conjunction with our sturdy base carrier, which utilizes a modular plug connector. The holder can be easily clipped into the frame of the holder, which rotates 360° (optimal for watching films, viewing photos, composing e-mails, Facebook, Twitter, etc). Not for vehicles equipped with optional factory rear seat entertainment or optional sport seats. Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
byooption.name: BMW iPad Holder

byooption.longDescription: The BMW Kayak Carrier can hold a variety of single-occupant watercrafts up to 34" wide and/or 75 lb, and features a lockable folding mechanism for increased overhead clearance when not in use. Fully adjustable, premium padding gently cradles and protects the watercraft, ensuring snug & secure positioning during transit and is constructed of ultra-strong, steel tubing construction with a rust-resistant powder-coat finish.  A base support system is required for mounting the Kayak Carrier to the roof rails.  This is an accessory product and prices excludes installation and taxes.  Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change.

byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2017 BMW X1 xDrive28i models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $339 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $32,699 (MSRP of $38,595, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $3,000 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $1,896 and $1,000 Lease Credit).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual monthly lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $3,000 down payment, $339 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.25/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $23,543.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: Bathe the cabin in light with the Panoramic moonroof. Its extra-large dual-glass panels include a power slide and lift control, a comfort opening/closing function, a wind deflector to help keep unwanted breezes out, and a power sunshade to shield passengers from excessive glare and heat.

byooption.longDescription: Fully integrated navigation system with a 6.5" display screen. The highly detailed maps now offer a variety of views to help make finding your route even easier.  Multiple route displays are possible such as arrow pointers, map display north-up, direction of travel, as well as perspective view.  Bluetooth Hands Free Interface including audio streaming.
byooption.name: Navigation Business

byooption.longDescription: With Remote Services, you’re never far from your BMW. Locked out? Simply call the BMW Assist Response Center or launch the BMW Connected app and unlock your doors with a few taps. Additionally, with Remote Services and BMW Connected you can locate your vehicle, turn on the ventilation system, send destinations to your navigation system, and more. Remote Services also provides peace of mind - if your BMW is ever stolen, file a police report then call the BMW Assist Response Center and they will help the police locate your vehicle. The BMW Connected app is available for iOS and Android devices.  Please check with your insurance company if this feature qualifies for a premium discount.
byooption.name: Remote Services

conflictAddOptions.description: With Remote Services, you’re never far from your BMW. Locked out? Simply call the BMW Assist Response Center or launch the BMW Connected app and unlock your doors with a few taps. Additionally, with Remote Services and BMW Connected you can locate your vehicle, turn on the ventilation system, send destinations to your navigation system, and more. Remote Services also provides peace of mind - if your BMW is ever stolen, file a police report then call the BMW Assist Response Center and they will help the police locate your vehicle. The BMW Connected app is available for iOS and Android devices.  Please check with your insurance company if this feature qualifies for a premium discount.
conflictAddOptions.name: Remote Services

byooption.longDescription: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead and bring your vehicle to a complete stop, if needed - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection.  These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: ACC Stop & Go + Active Driving Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.
byooption.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package

byooption.longDescription: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.
byooption.name: Parking Assistant

options.name: Parking Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
byooption.name: Park Distance Control

byooption.longDescription: SiriusXM-equipped BMWs come with a 1-year trial to the Sirius All Access package.  You'll hear every SiriusXM channel available in your BMW, including commercial-free music, plus all your favorite sports, exclusive talk, entertainment and all of our premium programming. byooption.longDescription: With Remote Services, you’re never far from your BMW. Locked out? Simply call the BMW Assist Response Center or launch the BMW Connected app and unlock your doors with a few taps. Additionally, with Remote Services and BMW Connected you can locate your vehicle, turn on the ventilation system, send destinations to your navigation system, and more. Remote Services also provides peace of mind - if your BMW is ever stolen, file a police report then call the BMW Assist Response Center and they will help the police locate your vehicle. The BMW Connected app is available for iOS and Android devices.  Please check with your insurance company if this feature qualifies for a premium discount.
byooption.name: Remote Services

options.description: With Remote Services, you’re never far from your BMW. Locked out? Simply call the BMW Assist Response Center or launch the BMW Connected app and unlock your doors with a few taps. Additionally, with Remote Services and BMW Connected you can locate your vehicle, turn on the ventilation system, send destinations to your navigation system, and more. Remote Services also provides peace of mind - if your BMW is ever stolen, file a police report then call the BMW Assist Response Center and they will help the police locate your vehicle. The BMW Connected app is available for iOS and Android devices.  Please check with your insurance company if this feature qualifies for a premium discount.
